properties.Name: LedgerAccountCategory
properties.Description:
A categorization of ledger accounts based on their representational characteristics.

The chart of accounts will have three major types of accounts:

Ex:

ASSETS
- Cash
- A/R
- Supplies
- Equipment

LIABILITIES
- A/P
- Notes Payable

REVENUE AND EXPENSES
- Service Revenue
- Rental Revenue
- Commission Revenue
- Rent Expense
- Salaries Expense
- Insurance Expense

Columns.Name: LedgerAccountCategoryId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Ledger Account Category.

Columns.Name: LedgerAccountCategoryName
Columns.Description: The name of a Ledger Account Category.

Columns.Name: LedgerAccountCategoryDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a Ledger Account Category.
